- [ ] Includes incorrect example with explanation

- [ ] Has clear impact analysis
- [ ] Includes references to official docs
- [ ] Vue 2/3 compatibility is noted (if relevant)
- [ ] Code examples are complete and runnable
- [ ] TypeScript types are correct
